title: The Double Ledger
story_summary: The truth bursts out. The city learns how the Directorate used the BCI for secret punishments and blackmail. Angry crowds gather. Leaders are forced to face public tribunals. The Council is taken down. The BCI is shut off. New voices begin to shape Stenograd's future.

official.headline: Public Tribunal Begins
official.anchor_line: Open tribunal sessions convene to address recent public concerns.
official.contextual_reframing: Civic engagement reinforces Stenograd's commitment to accountability and collective stability.

official.headline: Council Transition Announced
official.anchor_line: City Council members and Directorate step aside for interim leadership.
official.contextual_reframing: Orderly leadership transition demonstrates the system's flexibility and prioritization of citizen confidence.

official.headline: Ledger Revealed Publicly
official.anchor_line: Official records confirm abuse of the BCI system. Public review is underway.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic learning ensures that misconduct is addressed transparently, reaffirming trust in progressive governance.

underground.headline: Shadow Ledger Leaks
underground.anchor_line: It's out there. The hidden records are real - abuse, blackmail, lives ruined.
underground.contextual_reframing: The secrets they buried can't stay hidden. Proof of control and cruelty fuels the anger on Stenograd's streets.

underground.headline: Tribunal In The Open
underground.anchor_line: Council officials forced to answer. Citizens demand truth, not managed speeches.
underground.contextual_reframing: People finally speak for themselves. There are no safe seats left when everyone's watching and memory spreads faster than fire.

underground.headline: System Exposed Publicly
underground.anchor_line: BCI's mask is off. Ledgers prove the Directorate's guilt and Stenograd demands a reckoning.
underground.contextual_reframing: The silence is broken. With the old guard removed, maybe this city can start over. Keep watching, keep fighting.
